unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers *Real*? New Analytics Tool Shakes Up the Gram**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers *Real*? New Analytics Tool Shakes Up The Gram**

unnormalised: Hey Insta fam! Tired of seeing influencers with "lakhs" of followers but engagement drier than Jodhpur in June? Well, a brand new follower analytics tool is making waves, and it's promising to expose those sneaky fake followings!
normalised: Hey Insta fam! Tired of seeing influencers with lakhs of followers but engagement drier than Jodhpur in June? Well, a brand new follower analytics tool is making waves, and it is promising to expose those sneaky fake followings!

unnormalised: Developed right here in Bengaluru by IIT Madras grads, this tool claims to dig deeper than existing platforms. Think it's just about spotting bots? Nope! They're analyzing things like comment patterns, post timing (were they all uploaded at 03:00 AM?), and even language use – apparently, tons of fake accounts are commenting in broken Hindi.
normalised: Developed right here in Bengaluru by I I T Madras grads, this tool claims to dig deeper than existing platforms. Think it is just about spotting bots? Nope! They are analyzing things like comment patterns, post timing (were they all uploaded at zero three zero zero A M?), and even language use – apparently, tons of fake accounts are commenting in broken Hindi.

unnormalised: Early reports suggest some BIG names are about to see their follower counts PLUMMET. We're talking Bollywood A-listers and even that chaiwala who went viral back in 2016! One user, Priya Sharma from Delhi, told us, "I ran it on my account and discovered almost 20% of my followers were ghost accounts! OMG!"
normalised: Early reports suggest some BIG names are about to see their follower counts PLUMMET. We are talking Bollywood A-listers and even that chaiwala who went viral back in two thousand and sixteen! One user, Priya Sharma from Delhi, told us, "I ran it on my account and discovered almost twenty percent of my followers were ghost accounts! O M G!"

unnormalised: Expect major updates on 26/01/2024, including integration with other social media platforms. Pre-orders open at 10:00 hrs tomorrow. Will this finally bring transparency to influencer marketing in India? Time will tell! Stay tuned for more updates, especially after the official launch event on 15/08/2024.
normalised: Expect major updates on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four, including integration with other social media platforms. Pre-orders open at ten zero zero hours tomorrow. Will this finally bring transparency to influencer marketing in India? Time will tell! Stay tuned for more updates, especially after the official launch event on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four.
